snippet.title: Crafting A Narrative — Behind the Scenes of The Expanse: A Telltale Series
snippet.description:
“Everybody could die, except for one person. Everybody could live, except for one person.” 

When we say that your choices actually matter in The Expanse: A Telltale Series, we mean it. What you do in the very first episode will carry through to the end of the season. Watch this latest behind-the-scenes episode to learn more about the life aboard a scavenger ship in deep space, set in the universe of the sci-fi series, The Expanse.

Epic Game Store
Standard Edition: https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=StoryTrailer&sub_id=telltale 
Deluxe Edition: https://store.epicgames.com/p/the-expanse-a-telltale-series--deluxe-edition?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=CraftingNarrativeTrailer&sub_id=telltale

Xbox
Deluxe Edition: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mwg1nj92q94?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=CraftingNarrativeTrailer
Standard Edition: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nfxwr3nbq9s?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=CraftingNarrativeTrailer

PlayStation:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004308/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=trailer&utm_campaign=CraftingNarrativeTrailer
